text: Margarita Maslennikova (2 November 1928 – 5 March 2021) was a Soviet cross- country skier who competed in the 1950s. She was born in Leningrad. She won a gold medal in the 3 × 5 km relay at the 1954 FIS Nordic World Ski Championships in Falun. Maslennikova died in Saint Petersburg on 5 March 2021, aged 92.В Петербурге скончалась советская лыжница Маргарита Масленникова ==References== Category:Soviet skiers Category:2021 deaths Category:1928 births
title: Margarita Maslennikova
